content.title: Blue Collar Rocket
content.description: I built this as a capstone project of my web development boot camp. Blue Collar Rocket is an React app to streamline processes in craftsmanship.

content.title: This Website
content.description: I developed this website with Gatsby and Tailwind. I love sharing knowledge and learning in public therefore I implemented a blog.

content.title: LIFE-AHEAD.ORG
content.description: A personal project with the goal of starting a non-profit organization to help parents in grief. Therefore we already ran successfully a crowdfunding campaign. I made this website first with WordPress and migrated it later to Chimpify.
